name: Beef Stroganoff
author: Rebecca Hooper

ingredients.name: lb. top round steak (1?2 inch thick)

instructions: Cut meat in strips 1 by 2 inches; dredge in 3 Tbsp. flour and brown in fat. Push meat to one side of pan, add onion; cook until soft. Add mushrooms, 1?2 cup consomme, lemon juice, salt and pepper to meat and onion mixture. Cover pan; cook over low heat 45 to 60 minutes or until meat is tender. Blend remaining 2 Tbsp. of flour with remaining consomme, add to hot mixture-cook over low heat until sauce is smooth and thickened, stirring constantly. blend in sour cream and heat; do not boil. Serve over hot noodles or rice.
